resources.name: en
resources.title: English
resources.string_add: Treat replies as comments in 'New comments' notification.
A member mentioned your name in a post or comment.
A member became your friend.
A member is now following your profile.
Someone posted a new comment on your content.
Someone you follow posted a new comment.
New comments were posted in a space you follow.
A member replied to one of your comments.
A member liked one of your posts or comments.
Someone you follow liked a post or comment.
Someone liked content in a space you follow.
A member gave your content an 'Up' vote.
Someone you follow gave an 'Up' vote to some content.
Someone gave an 'Up' vote to content in a space you follow.
A member gave your content a 'Down' vote.
Someone you follow gave a 'Down' vote to some content.
Someone gave a 'Down' vote to content in a space you follow.
Someone became a fan of your profile, page, or group.
Someone you follow gained new fans.
A space you follow gained new fans.
You have been invited to join a space (group, event, etc.).
Someone requested to join your space (group, event, etc.).
Someone you follow received a new join request for their space.
A space you follow received a new join request.
A new post, article, or update relevant to you was published.
Someone you follow published new content.
New content was published in a space you follow.
There is an item or request that needs your attention.
Your previously posted content was edited or updated.
New posts have been added to your timeline.
Someone you follow shared a new post on their timeline.
New posts were shared on the timeline of a space you follow.
